EmailTemplate.description: Email to notify the field that a request was received
EmailTemplate.name: Acct Maint WRF BSD Pricing
EmailTemplate.subject: Maintenance Request Received:{!Case.CaseNumber} - {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Case.WRF_Requestor_Name__c},
Thank you for your Maintenance Request submission for {!Case.Account}. We appreciate the opportunity to work with you.
The expected completion date/time for this type of request is {!Case.AM_Expected_Due_Date__c}. If this request is complex and qualifies as a Project, you will be notified of an updated turnaround time.
Your Support # is {!Case.CaseNumber}
You can click here to view the request in Salesforce.com.
Thank you,
Account Maintenance Team
